title: Windows 10 Update - Bugsplat
body: I recently updated Windows 10 on my computer and now whenever I try to load into a game, I am immediately met with the bugsplat error. Thus far I've tried installing/updating drivers and repairing the game in the client, however I'm still getting this error. Please help!

replies.body: There could be a number of reasons that this is happening, like outdated drivers after the update or corrupt game files.  I suggest going over [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide which will go through several steps to help fix this up.  That should get you squared away, but let me know if the issue persists!
I have gone through and updated everything listed there and I'm still getting the bug splat. It happens right as champion select ends. The loading screen doesn't even show up.
